channel.title: Google Encoded Polyline Algorithm Format on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Google Encoded Polyline Algorithm Format on Mark Needham

item.title: Strava: Calculating the similarity of two runs
item.description: I go running several times a week and wanted to compare my runs against each other to see how similar they are. I record my runs with the Strava app and it has an API that returns lat/long coordinates for each run in the Google encoded polyline algorithm format. We can use the polyline library to decode these values into a list of lat/long tuples. For example: import polyline polyline.
